metadata.title: CVE-2023-0845 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Consul and Consul Enterprise allowed an authenticated user withservice:write permissions to trigger a workflow that causes Consul serverand client agents to crash under certain circumstances. This vulnerabilitywas fixed in Consul 1.14.5.

criterions.comment: consul package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
